alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:34PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Malheur County through 315 PM PDT... At 234 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saddle Butte, or 25 miles northwest of Rome, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Saddle Butte around 340 PM MDT. Sacramento Butte, Iron Point and Cedar Mountain around 410 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM PDT for southeastern Oregon.
